page.title: 15Transport
page.content: Litlington In our block there are four methods of transport. For instance cycle,walk ,bus and car.If you don't have a bike you walk.Most of the time my friend's dad goes by car but on sunny days he bikes to work,my mum bikes everywhere in the village but otherwise she goes by car. Steeple Morden In Steeple Morden the most common form of transport are walk,bike,car and bus.But most of the time I see people walk. This is how my family gets around: My mum goes by car,my dad goes by car,my sister goes by coach and car, and I walk,cycle and go by car.
